rules_text:
Shipwright 1 [i](When this enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or a Vehicle you control.)[/i]
Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have trample.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
